channel.title: Behance Network Featured Projects
channel.description: The latest projects featured on the Behance Network

item.title: Ethinc Forced Displacement - Jahalin Bedouins
item.description: The Arab al-Jahalin is the biggest bedouin community that lives in the desert between Jerusalem and Jericho. This part of the West Bank is called Area C, where Israel retains control over security as well as planning and zoning, and holds strategic significance for further expansion of illegal Israeli settlements. The bedouins live in miserable shacks, without electricity or running water, grazing their sheeps between debris and dreaming of the flourishing desert of Beersheva, where theyíve been forcefully evicted, across the 1949 armistice lines by Israeli authorities. In the last 15 years the Bedouin communities have been subject to demolition, requisition of cattle, attacks by settlers, aimed to get away from the area. But despite this, the communities have shown determination and unbelievable resilience, who led the Israeli military authorities to draw up a "relocation" plan, presented last October. Ignoring the aspirations, needs, traditions and the system of relations inherent in the Bedouin culture, the plan provides the deportation and a forced establishment of the Jahalin tribe next to the Abu Dis rubbish dump. For other Bedouins living in the Jordan Valley is expected a similar fate, with the creation of a complex near Nabi Musa.
item.content:encoded: The Arab al-Jahalin is the biggest bedouin community that lives in the desert between Jerusalem and Jericho. This part of the West Bank is called Area C, where Israel retains control over security as well as planning and zoning, and holds strategic significance for further expansion of illegal Israeli settlements. The bedouins live in miserable shacks, without electricity or running water, grazing their sheeps between debris and dreaming of the flourishing desert of Beersheva, where theyíve been forcefully evicted, across the 1949 armistice lines by Israeli authorities. In the last 15 years the Bedouin communities have been subject to demolition, requisition of cattle, attacks by settlers, aimed to get away from the area. But despite this, the communities have shown determination and unbelievable resilience, who led the Israeli military authorities to draw up a "relocation" plan, presented last October. Ignoring the aspirations, needs, traditions and the system of relations inherent in the Bedouin culture, the plan provides the deportation and a forced establishment of the Jahalin tribe next to the Abu Dis rubbish dump. For other Bedouins living in the Jordan Valley is expected a similar fate, with the creation of a complex near Nabi Musa.

item.title: OFFF 2011 Barcelona
item.description: This is my humble participation for OFFF 2011 Barcelona Year Zero event, a motion piece about theory of everything and an illustration about Year Zero itself.
item.content:encoded: This is my humble participation for OFFF 2011 Barcelona Year Zero event, a motion piece about theory of everything and an illustration about Year Zero itself.

item.title: Intro font
item.description: Intro family includes 26 very unique font styles & weights. The font family is characterized by excellent legibility in both web & print design areas, well-finished geometric designs, optimized kerning etc. Intro is most suitable for headlines of all sizes, as well as for text blocks that come in both maximum and minimum variations. The font styles are applicable for any type of graphic design web, print, motion graphics, etc. and perfect for t-shirts and other items like posters and logos.
item.content:encoded: Intro family includes 26 very unique font styles & weights. The font family is characterized by excellent legibility in both web & print design areas, well-finished geometric designs, optimized kerning etc. Intro is most suitable for headlines of all sizes, as well as for text blocks that come in both maximum and minimum variations. The font styles are applicable for any type of graphic design web, print, motion graphics, etc. and perfect for t-shirts and other items like posters and logos.

item.title: Branding & Textile Design 2011
item.description: One of my favorite parts of the design process is the shading and detailing pre-color. And although I love color, I always enjoy that point when a design is complete and in it's black and white/greyscale phase. This is a collection of branding and textile work I've done around 2011 and late 2010.
item.content:encoded: One of my favorite parts of the design process is the shading and detailing pre-color. And although I love color, I always enjoy that point when a design is complete and in it's black and white/greyscale phase. This is a collection of branding and textile work I've done around 2011 and late 2010.

item.title: VORWERK Stadt der Milben
item.description: Bright Mites, Big City - this futuristic animation film by Mate Steinforth illustrates the development and destruction of a mite population in only 60 seconds. Enough time for cameos of Hello Kitty bobby pins, bright red lollipops, and - tadah!! - the Vorwerk mite blaster Tiger VT265. And for those who skipped their German classes: "Stadt der Milben" means "Mite City" and "Mehr Saugkraft. Weniger Mitbewohner" reads "More vacuum power. Fewer roommates"!
item.content:encoded: Bright Mites, Big City - this futuristic animation film by Mate Steinforth illustrates the development and destruction of a mite population in only 60 seconds. Enough time for cameos of Hello Kitty bobby pins, bright red lollipops, and - tadah!! - the Vorwerk mite blaster Tiger VT265. And for those who skipped their German classes: "Stadt der Milben" means "Mite City" and "Mehr Saugkraft. Weniger Mitbewohner" reads "More vacuum power. Fewer roommates"!

item.title: Qalto typeface
item.description: Qalto flows and leaps like freestyle jazz. Suited as a strong title or headline font, the letters and ligatures are composed of very thin hairlines and very thick elements. This high contrast conveys a stunning visual effect and a unique optical rhythm. Early on, Aron Jancso realized that "some words have good rhythm and others don't," and added stylistic alternatives for every lowercase and uppercase letter. If thats not enough, there are four different weights, so users can use different sizes with the same hairline thickness, which allows for artistic freedom in arrangement and composition.
item.content:encoded: Qalto flows and leaps like freestyle jazz. Suited as a strong title or headline font, the letters and ligatures are composed of very thin hairlines and very thick elements. This high contrast conveys a stunning visual effect and a unique optical rhythm. Early on, Aron Jancso realized that "some words have good rhythm and others don't," and added stylistic alternatives for every lowercase and uppercase letter. If thats not enough, there are four different weights, so users can use different sizes with the same hairline thickness, which allows for artistic freedom in arrangement and composition.

item.title: Personal Fest '11
item.description: One of the top companies in the Argentina cell phones industries, "Personal", organize every year a Rock & Pop music festival with international bands such us The Strokes & Sonic Youth, and also some up and coming local bands. Summoned by Santo Agency and with the collaboration of the excellent photographer Nacho Ricci, we worked on the global image and promotional campaign of the festival under the slogan "Which elements can't be miss in a party"
item.content:encoded: One of the top companies in the Argentina cell phones industries, "Personal", organize every year a Rock & Pop music festival with international bands such us The Strokes & Sonic Youth, and also some up and coming local bands. Summoned by Santo Agency and with the collaboration of the excellent photographer Nacho Ricci, we worked on the global image and promotional campaign of the festival under the slogan "Which elements can't be miss in a party"

item.title: Little Lady / Little Man
item.description: a series of vintage photographs taken by Yousuf Karsh along with life-size images of the same subject the day before her death. These life-size and larger than life-size image are photographic images printed on aluminum with UV ink.
item.content:encoded: a series of vintage photographs taken by Yousuf Karsh along with life-size images of the same subject the day before her death. These life-size and larger than life-size image are photographic images printed on aluminum with UV ink.

item.title: CONSUMPTION PROJECT
item.description: Imposed on our Planet our the demands of a population that has peaked beyond seven billion. We now find ourselves in the position of a population that is drowning in its excesses and therefore in its waste. Here the Artists have created and photographed these installations that represent the unbridled materialistic greed of our society.
item.content:encoded: Imposed on our Planet our the demands of a population that has peaked beyond seven billion. We now find ourselves in the position of a population that is drowning in its excesses and therefore in its waste. Here the Artists have created and photographed these installations that represent the unbridled materialistic greed of our society.

item.title: RAAD Branding
item.description: RAAD is an Architeture and Interior Design studio. In order to create a visual universe which reflects this duality Pacifica explored an hexagonal shape. This shape fills the space in a natural and perfect way. Example os this are hexagonal basaltic columns formed of cooled lava from ancient volcanic activity in an island in Ireland. Project: Branding - visual universe, Graphic Design - stationary and poster, Webdesing - website (design and development)
item.content:encoded: RAAD is an Architeture and Interior Design studio. In order to create a visual universe which reflects this duality Pacifica explored an hexagonal shape. This shape fills the space in a natural and perfect way. Example os this are hexagonal basaltic columns formed of cooled lava from ancient volcanic activity in an island in Ireland. Project: Branding - visual universe, Graphic Design - stationary and poster, Webdesing - website (design and development)

item.title: SyFy DreamMachines
item.description: The kind people of Universal Networks once again knocked on our door for a show package. This time for SyFy's new show called "DreamMachines". The Parker brothers, of the famous parkerbrotherschoppers.com/ are building dreammachines, which you thought only could excist in your dreams! "If you can Dream it, They can Build it!" Audio and sound design once again by Irish Power Studio Echolab. Delivered were: Promo Endpage Sponsorcards Titlecards Lower3rd Transitions Credits: Production & Creative Direction: Onesize Animation: Onesize Additional modeling by Michael Tschernjajew & Jeff Beukema Music Company : ECHOLAB Composer : Gavin Little Sound Designer : Gavin Little
item.content:encoded: The kind people of Universal Networks once again knocked on our door for a show package. This time for SyFy's new show called "DreamMachines". The Parker brothers, of the famous parkerbrotherschoppers.com/ are building dreammachines, which you thought only could excist in your dreams! "If you can Dream it, They can Build it!" Audio and sound design once again by Irish Power Studio Echolab. Delivered were: Promo Endpage Sponsorcards Titlecards Lower3rd Transitions Credits: Production & Creative Direction: Onesize Animation: Onesize Additional modeling by Michael Tschernjajew & Jeff Beukema Music Company : ECHOLAB Composer : Gavin Little Sound Designer : Gavin Little
